languages.text: "Впрочем... тайные ремесленники, которым вы доверили разбираться с... наследием нечестивца Дельфима, утверждают, что способны использовать данное устройство к вашей славе и... без риска..."

"However... the secret artisans to whom you have entrusted the task of dealing with the... legacy of the wicked Delphim, claim to be able to use this device to your advantage and... without any risks..."
languages.original_text: "Впрочем... тайные ремесленники, которым вы доверили разбираться с... наследием нечестивца Дельфима, утверждают, что способны использовать данное устройство к вашей славе и... без риска..."

traits.locale_text: "However... the secret artisans to whom you have entrusted the task of dealing with the... legacy of the wicked Delphim, claim to be able to use this device to your advantage and... without any risks..."

"However... the secret artisans to whom you have entrusted the task of dealing with the... legacy of the wicked Delphim, claim to be able to use this device to your advantage and... without any risks..."

"However... the secret artisans to whom you have entrusted the task of dealing with the... legacy of the wicked Delphim, claim to be able to use this device to your advantage and... without any risks..."

"However... the secret artisans to whom you have entrusted the task of dealing with the... legacy of the wicked Delphim, claim to be able to use this device to your advantage and... without any risks..."

"However... the secret artisans to whom you have entrusted the task of dealing with the... legacy of the wicked Delphim, claim to be able to use this device to your advantage and... without any risks..."

"However... the secret artisans to whom you have entrusted the task of dealing with the... legacy of the wicked Delphim, claim to be able to use this device to your advantage and... without any risks..."

languages.text: “然而……那些被您委托负责处理……德尔菲姆遗产的秘密工匠师声称，他们可以够将这个装置为您所用，而且……不会带来任何风险……”
languages.original_text: "However... the secret artisans to whom you have entrusted the task of dealing with the... legacy of the wicked Delphim, claim to be able to use this device to your advantage and... without any risks..."

traits.locale_text: “然而……那些被您委托负责处理……德尔菲姆遗产的秘密工匠师声称，他们可以够将这个装置为您所用，而且……不会带来任何风险……”

languages.text: «Sin embargo... los artesanos secretos a los que ha confiado la tarea de lidiar con el... legado del malvado Delphim... afirman poder utilizar este artefacto en tu beneficio y... sin ningún riesgo...».
languages.original_text: "However... the secret artisans to whom you have entrusted the task of dealing with the... legacy of the wicked Delphim, claim to be able to use this device to your advantage and... without any risks..."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo... los artesanos secretos a los que ha confiado la tarea de lidiar con el... legado del malvado Delphim... afirman poder utilizar este artefacto en tu beneficio y... sin ningún riesgo...».

languages.text: 「しかし...邪悪なデルフィムの遺産を処理する仕事を...あなたに託された秘密の職工たちは、あなたの都合にあわせて...何のリスクもなくこの装置を使えると主張しています...」
languages.original_text: "However... the secret artisans to whom you have entrusted the task of dealing with the... legacy of the wicked Delphim, claim to be able to use this device to your advantage and... without any risks..."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし...邪悪なデルフィムの遺産を処理する仕事を...あなたに託された秘密の職工たちは、あなたの都合にあわせて...何のリスクもなくこの装置を使えると主張しています...」

languages.text: « Toutefois... les artisans secrets que vous avez chargés du... legs de l'ignoble Delphim affirment pouvoir utiliser l'appareil à votre avantage, et cela... sans le moindre risque... »
languages.original_text: "However... the secret artisans to whom you have entrusted the task of dealing with the... legacy of the wicked Delphim, claim to be able to use this device to your advantage and... without any risks..."

traits.locale_text: « Toutefois... les artisans secrets que vous avez chargés du... legs de l'ignoble Delphim affirment pouvoir utiliser l'appareil à votre avantage, et cela... sans le moindre risque... »

languages.text: "Allerdings solltet Ihr wissen ... Die Handwerker die sich in Eurem Auftrag heimlich mit dem ... Vermächtnis des bösen Delphim beschäftigen, sind überzeugt, dass sie dieses Gerät zu Eurem Vorteil einsetzen können. Und zwar ohne Risiko ..."
languages.original_text: "However... the secret artisans to whom you have entrusted the task of dealing with the... legacy of the wicked Delphim, claim to be able to use this device to your advantage and... without any risks..."

traits.locale_text: "Allerdings solltet Ihr wissen ... Die Handwerker die sich in Eurem Auftrag heimlich mit dem ... Vermächtnis des bösen Delphim beschäftigen, sind überzeugt, dass sie dieses Gerät zu Eurem Vorteil einsetzen können. Und zwar ohne Risiko ..."

languages.text: "Öte yandan... Adi Delphim'den kalanları incelemekle görevlendirdiğiniz gizli zanaatkârlar... Bu cihazdan faydalanabileceğinizi ve... Endişe etmenize gerek olmadığını iddia ediyor..."
languages.original_text: "However... the secret artisans to whom you have entrusted the task of dealing with the... legacy of the wicked Delphim, claim to be able to use this device to your advantage and... without any risks..."
